    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AboutDialogConfig
    This class contains configuration for a dialog box that displays information about an application (e.g., the name of the application and the author's email).
    AboutDialogConfig.AboutDialogConfigBuilder
    A builder that is used to create an instance of AboutDialogConfig.
    AppAboutDialog
    A dialog box that displays information about an application.
    AppStatusBar
    A status bar that displays help messages or the current status of an application.
    ByteUtils
    This class contains methods for manipulating byte arrays.
    CopyToClipboardAction<E>
    An action that will copy one or more selected entries in a table to the clipboard.
    CustomFileChooser
    A custom file chooser that will enable or disable the Open button based on some condition specified by a FileValidator when the user clicks on a file or enters the name and path of a file.
    CustomListCellRenderer<E>
    A renderer that displays a blue background when a mouse hovers over an item in the list.
    CustomScrollPane
    A JScrollPane that will forward a mouse wheel scroll event to the parent scroll pane, if one exists, when it reaches either the top or the bottom.
    CustomTableHeader
    A custom table header that prevents one or more columns from being moved.
    CustomTableModel<E>
    An interface that contains additional useful methods for table models.
    ExportAction<E>
    An action that will export the data in a table to a file.
    FileUtils
    Utility class that contains methods for reading from and writing to a file.
    FileValidator
    A validator that can be used to check whether a file is valid based on some condition.
    Interpolator
    A utility class that contains methods for performing linear interpolation.
    KeyValuePair
    Represents a key-value pair.
    ListCellLabel
    All Label objects must have a display name for readability.
    ListUtils
    Contains list-related utility methods.
    LoadingDialog
    A dialog that can be used to tell the user that something is being loaded.
    MessageUtils
    Utility methods for reading and writing a message, which is just an array of bytes.
    MessageUtils.DataType
    Represents the type for an object.
    Point<X,Y>
    A data point for a JFreeChart.
    StringUtils
    This class contains utility methods for string manipulation.
    UiUtils
    Contains UI-related utility methods.
    WindowCloseAction
    An action that will close the given frame.
